name: C.H.A.O.S Inc.
description:
In C.H.A.O.S Inc. you and a friend take the role of slimes working as janitors in old castles. Together you will clean up stains on the floor, sort boxes and avoid explosive crates. Earn Points for being good and especially fast at your job.

Now, don´t waste anymore time and get to work!

NOTE: Game is two players only.
